tool_description:
More Sports (Soccer, College Football/Basketball, NHL, etc) color themes coming soon!! 🔥🔥

Takes a minute to load, please be patient! 😃 (updating servers)

Discover the ultimate color scheme resource with our API, offering an extensive palette of colors across various formats including color names, RGB, Pantone, HEX, and CMYK for unparalleled customization. Elevate your design and project work with precise, versatile color options tailored to meet all your creative needs.
name: Sports Team Colors
title: Sports Team Colors

api_list.name: Get All NFL Team colors
api_list.description:
returns a nested object of all nfl teams as individual objects that has different color schemes as arrays:
ex:
"baltimore_ravens": {
"team colors": [
"Purple",
"Black",
"Gold",
"Red"
],
"rgb": [
"Purple (26, 25, 95)",
"Black (0, 0, 0)",
"Gold (158, 124, 12)",
"Red (198, 12, 14)"
],
"pantone": [
"Purple PMS 273 C",
"Black PMS BLACK 6 C",
"Gold PMS 8660 C",
"Red PMS 186 C"
],
"hex": [
"Purple #241773",
"Black #000000",
"Gold #9E7C0C",
"Red #C60C30"
],
"cmyk": [
"Purple (100, 100, 0, 5)",
"Black (70, 50, 50, 100)",
"Gold (0, 20, 80, 20)",
"Red (10, 100, 100, 0)"
]
},
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-team-colors.p.rapidapi.com/nflcolors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-team-colors.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://sports-team-colors.p.rapidapi.com/nflcolors"

api_list.name: Get All MLB teams colors
api_list.description:
returns a nested object of all mlb teams as individual objects that has different color schemes as arrays:
ex:
"arizona_diamondbacks": {
"team colors": [
"Sedona Red",
"Sonoran Sand",
"Black",
"Teal",
"White"
],
"rgb": [
"Sedona Red (167, 25, 48)",
"Sonoran Sand (227, 212, 173)",
"Black (0, 0, 0)",
"Teal",
"White (255, 255, 255)"
],
"pantone": [
"Sedona Red PMS 187 C",
"Sonoran Sand PMS 7500 C",
"Black PMS BLACK 6 C",
"Teal PMS 319 C"
],
"hex": [
"Sedona Red #A71930",
"Sonoran Sand #E3D4AD",
"Black #000000",
"Teal #30CED8",
"White #FFFFFF"
],
"cmyk": [
"Sedona Red (23, 100, 83, 17)",
"Sonoran Sand (11, 13, 35, 0)",
"Black (75, 68, 67, 90)",
"Teal (63, 0, 20, 0)",
"White (0, 0, 0, 0)"
]
},

api_list.name: Get all NBA Team colors
api_list.description:
returns a nested object of all nba teams as individual obj that has different color schemes as arrays:
ex:
"atlanta_hawks": {
"team colors": [
"Hawks Red",
"Volt Green",
"Hawks Charcoal"
],
"rgb": [
"Hawks Red (225, 68, 52)",
"Volt Green (196, 214, 0)",
"Hawks Charcoal (38, 40, 42)"
],
"pantone": [
"Hawks Red PMS 186 C",
"Volt Green PMS 382 C",
"Hawks Charcoal PMS 426 C"
],
"hex": [
"Hawks Red #E03A3E",
"Volt Green #C1D32F",
"Hawks Charcoal #26282A"
],
"cmyk": [
"Hawks Red (0, 91, 76, 6)",
"Volt Green (29, 2, 100, 0)",
"Hawks Charcoal (73, 65, 62, 67)"
]
},

print(response.json())
